Some skin and internal diseases, injuries, scars and burns can also cause hair loss. Most of the skin-borne hair losses is caused by diseases that holds the scalp, affect the scalp.

Shedding is inevitable if hair is affected by psoriasis, eczema, acne, lichen disease, over-lubricated skin, fungal diseases, burns, injuries.

The most satisfactory results in socializing and eliminating the psychological and depressive effects of irreversible hair loss are achieved with breatⓗtec™ hair technology.
